name: Ramon Goose
description: '''Ramon Goose''' (born 1975) is an English guitarist, singer and producer, known for his work with Latin Rock band [[Los Compadres|The Compadres]], West African Blues Project and the [[hip hop]] blues band NuBlues, for his mastery of the [[slide guitar]], and for producing albums for American blues artists. As a solo artist he has toured across the world performing concerts (including performing at Buckingham Palace) and released several albums to critical acclaim. He has also written the first-ever instructional book for the [[Ngoni (instrument)|n'goni]], a string instrument used by the people of [[Mali]], [[Senegal]], [[Gambia]], and other West African countries.
